dict.acceptation: （正式的）调查，研究；侦查；科学研究；学术研究；

sent.orig: A statistical investigation plan shall be drawn up according to statistical investigation items.
sent.trans: 统计调查计划按照统计调查项目编制。

sent.orig: State statistical investigation items refer to statistical investigation items concerning national basic situations.
sent.trans: 国家统计调查项目是指全国性基本情况的统计调查项目。

sent.orig: Methods On the combination of market investigation, inquiry, interview snake farmer and the field investigation.
sent.trans: 方法进行市场调查、询问、采访蛇农、实地考查相结合。

sent.orig: A statistical investigation shall be organized and implemented according to its statistical investigation system.
sent.trans: 统计调查应当按照统计调查制度组织实施。

sent.orig: The investigation data analysizes the fact, then tutors the action of corporate practice though the investigation.
sent.trans: 调研数据分析了六地企业顾客关系管理的现状，通过调研报告指导企业实践活动。
